title: The Hot Sauce Contraception Conspiracy
description:
Jeremy’s 30th birthday has been cancelled and he therefore will remain 29 until his favorite podcaster gives their blessing. Lauren and Jeremy debate the possibility of hot sauce as a possible form of contraception for the stars and who’s at fault for the Drake v. hot sauce condom debacle.
